com.example.tictactoe

Class TicTacToeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.tictactoe.TicTacToeModel

  • public class TicTacToeModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class checks to see if anybody has won as well as changing the turn to the other player if no winner has been decided
    Author:
    Matthew
